entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 20

entry.em: SUNDAY NIGHT AND MARTIN LUTHER KING JR DAY
entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
HIGHS AROUND 20

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
